import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
N=100000
p=0.5
cumulative_sum= 0
record = []
for i in range(N):
trial= np.random.binomial(n=1,p=p)
cumulative_sum = cumulative_sum+trial
average = cumulative_sum/(i+1)
record.append(average)
plt.plot(record)
plt.show()
